name: tm09
effect: Teaches Bullet Seed to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot at once.
